quotes.quote: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
quotes.speaker: Elon Musk

quotes.quote: A goal properly set is halfway reached.
quotes.speaker: Zig Ziglar

quotes.quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quotes.speaker: Wayne Gretzky

quotes.quote: The only way to discover the limits of the possible is to go beyond them into the impossible.
quotes.speaker: Arthur C. Clarke

quotes.quote: The most dangerous phrase in the language is, 'We've always done it this way.'
quotes.speaker: Grace Hopper
